Episodes.title: Pilot - S01E01
Episodes.synopsis: Skeletal remains are found in a pond in a national cemetery. Dr Temperance Brennan, who specialises in forensic anthropology, will try to identify the body.

Episodes.title: The Man In The SUV - S01E02
Episodes.synopsis: When Dr. Brennan uncovers the identity of a man killed while driving a car registered to a prominent Middle Eastern man with ties to the U.S. government, she and Booth find themselves tracking a terrorist.

Episodes.title: A Boy In The Tree - S01E03
Episodes.synopsis: Forensic expert Brennan and FBI agent Booth head to an elite prep school where a student was hanged, and must determine if it is suicide or murder.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Bear - S01E04
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth travel to Washington state to determine how a human arm ended up in the stomach of a black bear.

Episodes.title: A Boy In A Bush - S01E05
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan identifies remains of a 6-year-old boy who went missing from a local park and determines that he was sexually assaulted before being murdered.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Wall - S01E06
Episodes.synopsis: Angela and Brennan are caught in a melee at a hip-hop club, when a wall breaks open and reveals a mummified corpse and a stash of drugs.

Episodes.title: The Man On Death Row - S01E07
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth suspect a condemned man may be innocent, and fight for his stay of execution. It's when they exhume a body that doubts emerge.

Episodes.title: The Girl In The Fridge - SO1E08
Episodes.synopsis: When Brennan testifies in a case involving a dead woman found in a fridge, she crosses the path of an ex-boyfriend.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Fallout Shelter - S01E09
Episodes.synopsis: While trying to identify remains from the 1950s, Zack cuts into a bone and accidentally releases deadly fungus spores, causing the whole team to be quarantined in the lab over Christmas.

Episodes.title: The Woman At The Airport - S01E10
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth are off to Los Angeles airport, where a body part was found. They realise the victim had undergone extensive plastic surgery, including a skull transformation. Struggling to identify the body, the duo are drawn into the seedy LA call-girl scene.

Episodes.title: The Woman In The Car - S01E11
Episodes.synopsis: When a burnt-out car with a charred body and a kid's shoe is discovered, Booth fears not only murder but kidnapping. Booth and Brennan's investigation leads to a family embroiled in a high-profile court case, and kidnappers unafraid to get gruesome.

Episodes.title: The Superhero In The Alley - S01E12
Episodes.synopsis: Booth calls upon Brennan when a decomposed body is found in an alley, the cause of death unknown. Their investigation reveals the body is that of a teenage boy who had only comic books for friends. This strikes a chord with Brennan and she resolves to find his killer.

Episodes.title: The Woman In The Garden - S01E13
Episodes.synopsis: A gang member is stopped with a dug-up corpse in the boot of his car, but when he's questioned, a drive-by shooting gives him the chance to escape. Booth and Brennan find where the woman was buried, but they also find a second empty grave.

Episodes.title: The Man On The Fairway - S01E14
Episodes.synopsis: At the scene of a plane crash involving Chinese diplomats, Brennan finds three small bone fragments that did not come from the plane and might have something to do with a local man who went missing five years earlier.

Episodes.title: Two Bodies In The Lab - S01E15
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan is the target of a failed shooting, and Booth is caught in a bomb explosion. Are these events connected to the two bodies they are investigating? This is also the first episode where they play Hot Blooded by Foreinger.

Episodes.title: The Woman In The Tunnel - S01E16
Episodes.synopsis: When the remains of a filmmaker are found in the ventilation shaft of an underground tunnel, Brennan and Booth discover a subterranean world of homeless people.

Episodes.title: The Skull In The Desert - S01E17
Episodes.synopsis: While on holiday in the New Mexico desert, Angela asks Brennan to assist in identifying a skull she fears may be that of her boyfriend.

Episodes.title: The Man With The Bone - S01E18
Episodes.synopsis: When a body is found clutching a 300-year-old finger bone, Booth and Brennan's investigation leads them to a dive site where a pirate may have buried his treasure.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Morgue - S01E19
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan wakes in a motel, beaten and bloodied and unable to remember what happened. Having lost a day of her life, she calls in Booth to decipher her missing hours.

Episodes.title: The Graft In The Girl - S01E20
Episodes.synopsis: When they believe that a terminally ill girl may have been the victim of a crime, Brennan and Booth investigate a bone graft given to a cancer sufferer.

Episodes.title: The Soldier On The Grave - S01E21
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth probe the apparent suicide of a war protester. Their investigations force Booth to relive the horrors he witnessed as an army sniper.

Episodes.title: The Woman In Limbo - S01E22
Episodes.synopsis: The remains of a woman turn out to be those of ||Brennan's missing mother||. As dark family secrets are uncovered, Brennan must face a new reality.

Episodes.title: The Titan On The Tracks - S02E01
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the site of a train wreck that includes the bodies of a senator and a high-profile businessman; a mystery unravels around one of the victims; Brennan meets her new boss; Booth encourages Brennan to visit her mother's grave.

Episodes.title: The Mother And Child In The Bay - S02E02
Episodes.synopsis: When the remains of a pregnant woman are pulled from a lake, it seems like a straightforward case for Brennan and Booth. However, an alarming discovery about the foetus changes everything.

Episodes.title: The Boy In The Shroud - S02E03
Episodes.synopsis: Wrapped in a shroud, the body of a young man lies beside an overturned garbage truck; Brennan's past as a foster child influences her judgment; Brennan and Cam butt heads over their work styles; Cam makes threats.

Episodes.title: The Blonde In The Game - S02E04
Episodes.synopsis: A notorious serial killer, who Brennan helped put behind bars, plays a deadly game with the forensic scientist.

Episodes.title: The Truth In The Lye - S02E05
Episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan probe what appears to be a case of jealousy and insurance money when a man is found dead at a construction site, but new clues send them in a different direction.

Episodes.title: The Girl In Suite 2103 - S02E06
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a deadly explosion at a hotel where a conference on drug trafficking was being held, but soon discover that things are not what they seem. Has the intended target of the blast got something to hide? The body of a hotel waitress may hold the key.

Episodes.title: The Girl With The Curl - S02E07
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a young beauty queen's remains that are discovered at a water filtration plant; Hodgins asks Angela out on a date, which she accepts.

Episodes.title: The Woman In The Sand - S02E08
Episodes.synopsis: The skeletal remains of a federal prosecutor, who disappeared five years earlier, are discovered in the desert outside Las Vegas; an anonymous lead takes Booth and Brennan to the world of gambling and underground ultimate fighting.

Episodes.title: Aliens In A Spaceship - S02E09
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Hodgins find themselves buried alive and at the mercy of a brutal serial killer known as the Grave Digger. Can Booth find them before it's too late?

Episodes.title: The Headless Witch In The Woods - S02E10
Episodes.synopsis: While investigating the death of a film student who was working on a documentary about the legend of a headless witch who haunted the woods in the 1700s, Brennan develops a strong bond with the victim's brother.

Episodes.title: Judas On A Pole - S02E11
Episodes.synopsis: After the disembowelled body of an FBI agent is found burnt and hanging from a roof, Brennan and Booth find themselves deep in the middle of a dangerous conspiracy.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Cell - S02E12
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan's past returns to haunt her when notorious serial killer Howard Epps, a man she put behind bars, escapes and vows the ultimate revenge against her.

Episodes.title: The Girl In The Gator - S02E13
Episodes.synopsis: An eccentric FBI psychologist is assigned to help a troubled Booth overcome his feelings of guilt over the death of a serial killer. Meanwhile, Brennan heads to Florida to investigate the murder of a college girl who had been on spring break.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Mansion - S02E14
Episodes.synopsis: The Bancroft family calls on Brennan and Booth to investigate the stabbing death of Terence Bancroft; Agent Sullivan invites Brennan to his basketball game.

Episodes.title: The Bodies In The Book - S02E15
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan is left feeling guilty when her latest novel becomes the inspiration for a serial killer, who is copying her fictional murders down to the last detail.

Episodes.title: The Boneless Bride In The River - S02E16
Episodes.synopsis: Booth interrupts Brennan's vacation with her boyfriend (Eddie McClintock) to get help with the case of a woman whose boneless body was found in a river.

Episodes.title: The Priest In The Churchyard - S02E17
Episodes.synopsis: When a graveyard is flooded by a broken water main, Brennan is called in to identify the floating remains so that they can be reburied in the correct graves. However, the doctor is alarmed when she discovers new bones, despite being told that nobody has been buried there for over 50 years.

Episodes.title: The Killer In The Concrete - S02E18
Episodes.synopsis: Booth's investigation into a presumed dead hit man turns quite dangerous, and Brennan ends up turning to an unlikely source for help.

Episodes.title: Spaceman In A Crater - S02E19
Episodes.synopsis: Bones and her team must determine how a man was flattened in a pasture when his injuries don't coincide with the theory of the crime.

Episodes.title: The Glowing Bones In The Old Stone House - S02E20
Episodes.synopsis: Homeland security asks Bones to examine some remains, thinking they're radioactive, and although the site is cleared two questions remain: why was an up and coming chef murdered, and why are the bones still glowing?

Episodes.title: Stargazer In A Puddle - S02E21
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a small skeleton assumed to be that of a 10-year-old girl; Brennan's father reappears in her life to deliver information from her past.

Episodes.title: The Widow's Son In The Windshield - S03E01
Episodes.synopsis: A skull smashes the windshield of a car driven by a group of teenagers on the freeway; a trail of suspects leads Brennan and Booth to a strange cannibalistic society; Cam suggests that Angela hire a private investigator to find her ex-husband.

Episodes.title: The Soccer Mom In The Mini-Van - S03E02
Episodes.synopsis: A soccer mom dies as her car explodes, leading the team to discover that she was a murder suspect wanted for 30 years.

Episodes.title: Death In The Saddle - S03E03
Episodes.synopsis: A body with equine markings sends Booth and Bones into a world of fetishism, and Angela agrees to undergo hypnosis to get the name of her husband.

Episodes.title: The Secret In The Soil - S03E04
Episodes.synopsis: When the founder of an organic supermarket chain is found dead, Brennan and Booth suspect foul play by a rival farmer; the two agents visit a new psychiatrist, who warns that the FBI may separate them.

Episodes.title: Mummy In The Maze - S03E05
Episodes.synopsis: The discovery of two mummified girls has Booth and Bones checking a fun house, a Halloween maze and a church charity for clues that may lead them to a missing girl whose parents believe she's dead.

Episodes.title: The Intern In The Incinerator - S03E06
Episodes.synopsis: One of the Jeffersonian's interns is found in the incinerator, and most of the institute believes it's the work of the Gormogon serial killer.

Episodes.title: The Boy In The Time Capsule - S03E07
Episodes.synopsis: A 20-year-old body is found when a time capsule is opened, and focus turns towards the victim's fellow high school students.

Episodes.title: The Knight On The Grid - S03E08
Episodes.synopsis: The Gormogon killer strikes again, and his next play is a little close to home. Russ returns to face a parole violation when his girlfriend's daughter takes a turn for the worse.

Episodes.title: The Santa In The Slush - S03E09
Episodes.synopsis: Three days before Christmas the body of a bearded man in a tailor-made Santa outfit turns up in a sewer; Brennan visits her father in prison and plots a nontraditional holiday reunion.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Mud - S03E10
Episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan investigate the death of a motorcycle racer, and when another seeming accident occurs on the track attention turns to the team owners and a reporter, meanwhile Dr. Sweets manipulates them into a 'social outing' with him and his girlfriend.

Episodes.title: Player Under Pressure - S03E11
Episodes.synopsis: The team take on a case in which they must reconstruct the shattered bones of a promising college athlete. Maybe his sister is involved in his untimely demise. Meanwhile, Angela and Hodgins have an important talk about their feelings for one another.

Episodes.title: The Baby In The Bough - S03E12
Episodes.synopsis: Miraculously surviving a suspicious car accident that kills its mother, a baby is left with Booth and Bones who care for the infant while investigating the crime.

Episodes.title: The Verdict In The Story - S03E13
Episodes.synopsis: When Max goes on trial for the murder of FBI Deputy Director Robert Kirby, all the team members but Brennan are called as expert witnesses for the prosecution.

Episodes.title: The Wanna-Be In The Weeds - S03E14
Episodes.synopsis: An aspiring singer (Ace Young) is murdered and, as Brennan and Booth investigate the musician's fans and foes, one obsessed woman transfers her affections to Booth.

Episodes.title: The Pain In The Heart - S03E15
Episodes.synopsis: Heartbreak hits the Squint Squad as they deal with the aftermath of the shooting and finally Gormogon and his Apprentice are revealed.

Episodes.title: The Yanks In The U.K (Parts 1 & 2) - S04E01
Episodes.synopsis: During Bones' stay in England, the daughter of an American businessman is murdered. The businessman insists that the FBI help with the case, so Booth and Bones investigate. Meanwhile, Angela's husband shows up at the Jeffersonian.

Episodes.title: The Man In The Outhouse - S04E02
Episodes.synopsis: A body is discovered in an outhouse. The victim is a host of show that exposes men's infidelities. Booth learns about Bones's dating situation.

Episodes.title: The Finger In The Nest - S04E03
Episodes.synopsis: While spending some time with his son, Booth finds a human finger. They find the body of a veterinarian. Hodgins starts to realize how he's been affected by the turmoil in his life.

Episodes.title: The Perfect Pieces In The Purple Pond - S04E04
Episodes.synopsis: The dissected body of an author with OCD is discovered by a pair of teenagers and leads the team on a search for the head and the killer. Also, Sweets and Hodgins visit Zack in the mental institution.

Episodes.title: The Crank In The Shaft - S04E05
Episodes.synopsis: Part of a leg drops into an elevator. The gruesome discovery finds the body had been in the shaft for a few days. The victim was an office manager who was disliked by everyone. As the team investigates, Angela and Hodgins come to terms with their break up.

Episodes.title: The He In The She - S04E06
Episodes.synopsis: Half a decomposed body is discovered by a pair of beach combers. They find the deceased was leader of a local religious congregation. When the other half of the body is found, they learn the leader had a hidden past.

Episodes.title: The Skull In The Sculpture - S04E07
Episodes.synopsis: A skull is found in a crushed car. The investigation leads to an artist who used crushed vehicles in his artwork, leaving the team to wonder if he made himself part of his art.

Episodes.title: The Con Man In The Meth Lab - S04E08
Episodes.synopsis: A body flies out of an exploding meth lab. As the team tries to identify the body, Booth works on a big case which could boost his career, but he's distracted when his brother shows up and shows some interest in Bones.

Episodes.title: The Passenger In The Oven - S04E09
Episodes.synopsis: Bones and Booth fly to China so Brennan can identify some remains. During the flight, a body is discovered inside an oven. Bones and Booth must solve the crime before the flight lands in China.

Episodes.title: The Bone That Blew - S04E10
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the remains of a bodyguard of two children who attend a high security school for the children of important people. Also, Cam hires Brennan's father as a teacher which causes some conflicts for Bones.

Episodes.title: Double Trouble In The Panhandle - S04E11
Episodes.synopsis: The remains of a set of conjoined twins are found on an oil field. When they find out the twins worked at a circus, Buck and Wanda will find the culprit.

Episodes.title: Fire In The Ice - S04E12
Episodes.synopsis: The body of a victim is found in a frozen lake. Booth identifies the body as a rival hockey player, making Booth a suspect in the crime. Now the Squints have to work with a new agent to solve the crime.

Episodes.title: The Hero In The Hold - S04E13
Episodes.synopsis: The Gravedigger returns and captures Booth. He wants the evidence that someone has stolen from the case, and he believes that Bones has it. Can the Squints find their friend before Booth becomes the Gravediggers latest casualty?

Episodes.title: The Princess And The Pear - S04E14
Episodes.synopsis: Booth asks Bones to fix his back again, but she ends up aggravating his condition. While Booth is sidelined, Bones works with Agent Perotta to solve the murder of a woman who was working at a Fantasy convention.

Episodes.title: The Bones That Foam - S04E15
Episodes.synopsis: Remains are discovered by a newly wed couple after they literally take the plunge. The squints soon determine the identity of the victim, but discovering the cause of death presents interesting dilemmas as a mysterious corrosive foam secreting from the bones is destroying the remains and causing the Jeffersonian's alarms go off with each test they try. Also, Bones tries to work on her interpersonal skills.

Episodes.title: The Salt In The Wounds - S04E16
Episodes.synopsis: The remains of a volleyball player are found in a Salt Truck. They discover that she was pregnant, and that several of her friends are also pregnant.

Episodes.title: The Doctor In The Den - S04E17
Episodes.synopsis: The murder of a doctor at a Wildlife Reserve gets a little personal for Cam, when the victim turns out to be a former paramour. Angela tries to go celibate to work on her relationship issues.

Episodes.title: The Science In The Physicist - S04E18
Episodes.synopsis: The frozen shattered remains of a scientist leads the team to a highly regarded research institute. Angela's father comes to town.

Episodes.title: The Cinderella In The Cardboard - S04E19
Episodes.synopsis: The flattened remains of a woman are found in a recycling plant, leading the team to a wedding planner, the woman's fiancee, and the owner of an online dating service. As the Squints work to solve the case, Bones and Booth are at odds when it appears that someone they know is cheating on a friend/colleague.

Episodes.title: Mayhem On A Cross - S04E20
Episodes.synopsis: Skeletal remains used by a Norwegian Black Metal Band lead the team to explore the underground music scene. Gordon-Gordon prepares to retire from psychology, but not before meeting with Sweets and helping Bones and Booth solve their current case.

Episodes.title: The Double Death Of The Dearly Departed - S04E21
Episodes.synopsis: While attending a coworker's funeral, Brennan realizes that he was murdered rather than dying of natural causes and begins covertly investigating his death.

Episodes.title: The Girl In The Mask - S04E22
Episodes.synopsis: Bones asks for Booth's advice on which of her assistants she should hire. Booth gets a call from a friend, a Japanese cop who Booth once worked with in an exchange program, who asks him to check on his sister. Unfortunately they locate her head. Now the squints must locate the body.

Episodes.title: The Beaver In The Otter - S04E23
Episodes.synopsis: The remains of a college student are found in a mascot costume from a rival college. As the squints investigate how the body got in there, Booth finds out what his brother plans on doing with his life after his court martial.

Episodes.title: The Critic In The Cabernet - S04E24
Episodes.synopsis: The remains are found in a barrel of wine. Bones realizes she wants to have a child and asks Booth for help.

Episodes.title: The Ending In The Beginning - S04E25
Episodes.synopsis: Story of a murder in a nightclub with multiple suspects, with familiar faces in a different perspective. When the story's finished, Booth's health crisis takes an expected twist.

Episodes.title: Harbingers In A Fountain - S05E01
Episodes.synopsis: Bones returns from Guatemala as Booth is finally cleared for duty; Booth is anxious to prove he's fully recovered, even accepting help from Angela's psychic. Things take an interesting turn when the psychic informs them that there is a mass grave underneath a fountain.

Episodes.title: The Bond In The Boot - S05E02
Episodes.synopsis: A diamond courier carrying a briefcase is killed. State Department requests discretion while investigating due to National Security concerns. Meanwhile, Wendell loses his scholarship, and Booth tries to relearn plumbing techniques.

Episodes.title: The Plain in the Prodigy - S05E03
Episodes.synopsis: Bones and Booth investigate the murder of an Amish piano prodigy.

Episodes.title: The Beautiful Day In The Neighbourhood - S05E04
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate human remains found at a neighborhood block party. Suburban politics and secret scandals give each neighbor in the cul-de-sac a motive, leaving Brennan, Booth and Sweets to sift through the drama to find their suspect. Meanwhile, Jeffersonian intern Arastoo comes clean about his background, and Booth's son attempts to find Booth a girlfriend.

Episodes.title: A Night At The Bones Museum - S05E05
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth are on speed-dial when charred human remains are found by an electrical fence. Forensics determine that the `victim' is a mummified Egyptian royal that's on loan to the Jeffersonian. It's not long before there's a nasty twist in the tale: the curator charged with prepping the mummy for exhibition is slaughtered.

Episodes.title: The Tough Man In The Tender Chicken - S05E06
Episodes.synopsis: A few feathers are ruffled when Booth and Brennan investigate the demise of a chicken farmer at the centre of an animal cruelty row. The case prompts Angela to launch an animal-rights.

Episodes.title: The Dwarf In The Dirt - S05E07
Episodes.synopsis: Booth must be recertified for FBI marksmanship, but he is not the accurate shot he was before having brain surgery; Brennan and Booth investigate the death of a little person who was a wrestler.

Episodes.title: The Foot In The Foreclosure - S05E08
Episodes.synopsis: Grampa Booth is in town, playing matchmaker between his grandson and Brennan. Meanwhile, the charred remains of a pair of plus-size lovers are found by a real estate agent who was showing the property to prospective buyers.

Episodes.title: The Gamer In The Grease - S05E09
Episodes.synopsis: The remains of a competitive gamer are found in a grease truck; Sweets, Hodgins and Jeffersonian intern Colin camp out for tickets to a movie premiere.

Episodes.title: The Goop On The Girl - S05E10
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan's father invites a distant relative, Margaret Whitesell, to spend Christmas with him and his daughter; Brennan and Booth investigate when a man dressed as Santa Claus is blown up after a botched bank robbery.

Episodes.title: The X In The File - S05E11
Episodes.synopsis: When human remains with extraterrestrial attributes are found, Brennan and Booth head to Mexico. The victim was in fact a UFO fanatic. Angela and Wendell admit to their relationship.

Episodes.title: The Proof In The Pudding - S05E12
Episodes.synopsis: Government agents put the Jeffersonian team on lockdown, insisting that they determine the cause of death of a top-secret and unidentified corpse. Meanwhile, Booth breaks into the lab to investigate the goings on.

Episodes.title: The Dentist In The Ditch - S05E13
Episodes.synopsis: When a skeleton is uncovered within the trenches of a Civil War battleground, Brennan determines that the remains are those of a present-day dentist. Jared returns with interesting news.

Episodes.title: The Devil In The Details - S05E14
Episodes.synopsis: When disfigured remains oddly relate to biblical text, Booth and Brennan discover that the victim was a patient at a sanitarium. There are a whole host of suspects as a result.

Episodes.title: The Bones On The Blue Line - S05E15
Episodes.synopsis: After a subway train is thrown off the track by 60,000 gallons of flood water, the partially skeletal body of a professional ghost writer named Martin Aragon emerges out of the overflow.

Episodes.title: The Parts In The Sum Of The Whole - S05E16
Episodes.synopsis: Bones's 100th episode, recounts the events of the first case on which Brennan and Booth worked together, and how other Jeffersonian team members' relationships began.'

Episodes.title: The Death Of The Queen Bee - S05E17
Episodes.synopsis: When an unidentified skull and upper torso are discovered at Burtonsville High School, the remains turn out to be one of Brennan's former classmates. With possible connection to another murder committed 15 years prior, Brennan and Booth attend the high school reunion as an undercover married couple.

Episodes.title: The Predator In The Pool - S05E18
Episodes.synopsis: Things get fishy when human remains are found inside a shark's belly. Meanwhile, Brennan and Booth are forced to address their complicated relationship.

Episodes.title: The Rocker In The Rinse Cycle - S05E19
Episodes.synopsis: The human remains of contractor Richard Cole are discovered in a hotel washing machine. Cole was a wealthy, eccentric daredevil, always looking for a kick in life and the next thrill.

Episodes.title: The Witch In The Wardrobe - S05E20
Episodes.synopsis: When a cabin in the woods burns down, the bodies of two `witches' are revealed; Angela and Hodgins are arrested.

Episodes.title: The Boy With The Answer - S05E21
Episodes.synopsis: The trial of The Gravedigger hits close to home for members of the team, and everyone at the Jeffersonian must work overtime to uncover the forensic evidence to elicit a conviction.

Episodes.title: The Beginning In The End - S05E22
Episodes.synopsis: The team works to uncover clues buried under a life's worth of possessions saved by a hoarder in order to solve the mystery of his death. Meanwhile, Angela's father has a specific purpose for his most recent visit, and Brennan and Booth are confronted with unique opportunities.

Episodes.title: The Mastodon In The Room - S06E01
Episodes.synopsis: From all over the world Brennan's former team reassembles to help Cam solve a difficult case of identifying an unknown baby's corpse, as her failure to do so may wreck her career. They soon realize this may not be just one case, but two.

Episodes.title: The Couple In The Cave - S06E02
Episodes.synopsis: The team must piece together the remains of a man and a woman after they are found within a cave at National Park. Meanwhile, Hannah Burley pays a surprise visit.

Episodes.title: The Maggots In The Meathead - S06E03
Episodes.synopsis: When the decomposed remains of Richie `The V' Genaro are found at the Jersey Shore after a night out clubbing, Booth and Brennan question his peers and the club bouncer. Meanwhile, Angela tries to keep her pregnancy a secret.

Episodes.title: The Body And The Bounty - S06E04
Episodes.synopsis: When a skull and decomposing hands are found in a dumpster, the team searches for the rest of the victim's remains; Brennan agrees to shoot an episode of a children's show with professor Bunsen, 'The Science Dude' Jude.

Episodes.title: The Bones That Weren't - S06E05
Episodes.synopsis: The skull of a promising young dancer is found lodged in concrete at a construction site. Evidence soon points to a suspect who had a secret relationship with the victim. Meanwhile, Hannah's life is put in critical danger.

Episodes.title: The Shallow In The Deep - S06E06
Episodes.synopsis: Human remains from a 150-year-old slave ship surface; the investigation leads Booth and Brennan to a cruise where a murder victim was seen moments before his death.

Episodes.title: The Babe In The Bar - S06E07
Episodes.synopsis: An event for a candymaker turns bitter when human remains are discovered in the world's largest chocolate bar; Cam struggles with her daughter's decision to attend a college that fails to meet her high standards.

Episodes.title: The Twisted Boness In The Melted Truck - S06E08
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a crime scene where a human carcass has melted to the dashboard of a charred truck; Sweets tries to keep his feelings for Daisy from interfering while helping her pass a government psychological evaluation.

Episodes.title: The Doctor In The Photo - S06E09
Episodes.synopsis: The corpse of a surgeon is found in a rough neighbourhood. There are multiple fractures in the skull and no indication as to how or why she was there. Brennan perceives many parallels with the victim, and so learns much of her past.

Episodes.title: The Body In The Bag - S06E10
Episodes.synopsis: An unidentifiable body is discovered in the shower of an upscale home belonging to a young female socialite. Skeletal reconstruction and evidence in the drain reveal that the victim was a young girl employed by a counterfeit handbag distributor.

Episodes.title: The Bullet In The Brain - S06E11
Episodes.synopsis: The city anxiously anticipates the arrival of Heather Taffet, more notoriously known as 'The Gravedigger,' for her final appeal after being sentenced to death for a kidnap-murder and a series of similar coldblooded crimes. But when a bullet targeted at The Gravedigger is fired from a distance and hits her, the Jeffersonian team is tasked to piece together the sniper's precise location as well as identify the suspect and his motives.

Episodes.title: The Sin In The Sisterhood - S06E12
Episodes.synopsis: A body disguised as a scarecrow is found with a bullet wound in a remote cornfield and the team is forced to work against the clock to avoid a storm and potential complications that would affect the evidence. Booth and Brennan interrogate the victim's three wives, who are also sisters, learning that jealousy and desire had caused a major rift in the family.

Episodes.title: The Daredevil In The Mold - S06E13
Episodes.synopsis: A BMX rider's remains are discovered on the roof of a warehouse after a failed bike stunt. Meanwhile, Sweets seeks advice about his relationship with Daisy and Booth makes a decision about his relationship with Hannah.

Episodes.title: The Bikini In The Soup - S06E14
Episodes.synopsis: The liquefied remains of a wedding planner are found in her home tanning bed on Valentine's Day and Cam pressures her team to solve the case in time so she can celebrate the holiday with her boyfriend. In the meanwhile, Booth and Brennan interrogate a slew of possible suspects until they unlock classified files in the victim's computer, which lead to their main suspect.

Episodes.title: The Killer In The Crosshairs - S06E15
Episodes.synopsis: After notoriously murdering `The Gravedigger', sniper-on-the-loose Jacob Broadsky strikes again. More determined than ever to catch Broadsky, Booth uses his own military training to beat him at his own game.

Episodes.title: The Blackout In The Blizzard - S06E16
Episodes.synopsis: A severe blizzard causes a city-wide blackout, adding to the obstacles the team must overcome in order to solve a murder case that could be linked to a potential viral outbreak. When Booth and Brennan find themselves trapped in an elevator during the power outage, Sweets offers outside assistance.

Episodes.title: The Feet On The Beach - S06E17
Episodes.synopsis: The team investigate when seven pairs of dismembered feet wash ashore after a flood, and Brennan works with a forensic podiatrist to match the feet with bodies.

Episodes.title: The Truth In The Myth - S06E18
Episodes.synopsis: A TV-show host's remains are found in the wilderness; Vincent Nigel-Murray makes surprising confessions while making amends with each member of the team.

Episodes.title: The Finder - S06E19
Episodes.synopsis: The remains of a maritime museum security guard are found in the Florida Everglades after an attempt to steal an obsolete 17th century nautical chart fragment used to find treasures. In order to solve the crime, Booth seeks out Walter Sherman, a former Iraqi soldier with an uncanny gift to unearth anyone and anything.

Episodes.title: The Pinocchio in the Planter - S06E20
Episodes.synopsis: The team identify the remains of a successful advertising man on the grounds of a newly built community centre playground. Upon inspecting the victim's home and interrogating his former partner and employer, Booth and Brennan discover that the victim burned bridges by adopting an aggressive attitude toward honesty and was a member of a radical honesty support group.

Episodes.title: The Signs In The Silence - S06E21
Episodes.synopsis: A mysterious young deaf girl is thought to have committed a recent murder after she's found on the streets, covered in blood and holding a knife. It's up to the Jeffersonian team to figure out who this girl is and determine if she's really the one to blame for the murder.

Episodes.title: The Hole In The Heart - S06E22
Episodes.synopsis: The search for Broadsky intensifies as he manages to kill one of the Squints. Angela and Hodgins name their baby. Booth struggles to protect those closest to him, which leads to an unexpected situation.

Episodes.title: The Change In The Game - S06E23
Episodes.synopsis: The unidentifiable and gruesome remains of a male bowler are found lodged in the automatic pinsetter of a bowling lane. With no clear lead in the case, Booth and Brennan go undercover and join the very competitive bowling team in hopes of finding clues about the victim.

Episodes.title: The Memories In The Shallow Grave - S07E01
Episodes.synopsis: When the Jeffersonian team identifies the remains of a woman found in a paintball field, they discover two missing-persons reports in her file. Booth and Sweets interrogate the victim's husband and learn that she suffered from amnesia. When squint Wendell Bray learns that the victim also survived a bullet wound, inconsistencies in her medical records uncover a surprising crime linked to her murder.

Episodes.title: The Hot Dog In The Competition - S07E02
Episodes.synopsis: The team identifies the remains of a competitive-eating champion just days before a contest; a brilliant new squint has trouble fitting in; Booth and Brennan try to put themselves in each other's places after a disagreement about the baby.

Episodes.title: The Prince In The Plastic - S07E03
Episodes.synopsis: After the remains of a female toy company executive are found shrink-wrapped with a Prince Charming doll, the company's CEO gives Booth and Sweets access to the company headquarters' highly classified prototype lab, where details of the victim's personal life begin to emerge.

Episodes.title: The Male In The Mail - S07E04
Episodes.synopsis: When dismembered body parts are found scattered in multiple mailing boxes, the Jeffersonian team discover that the victim was employed at the local Ship `n' Print, where members of staff had recently split the winnings of a lottery ticket.

Episodes.title: The Twist In The Twister - S07E05
Episodes.synopsis: When the remains of a storm chaser are found, it seems that they died while following a tornado. But the team soon uncover evidence to suggest that he was murdered.

Episodes.title: The Crack In The Code - S07E06
Episodes.synopsis: After a cryptic message written in human blood is found at a national monument, the team ends up embarking on a scavenger hunt; Brennan and Booth search for their perfect family home.

Episodes.title: The Prisoner In The Pipe - S07E07
Episodes.synopsis: Body parts float up in a toilet. The team determine the deceased was a prisoner. Booth wants Brennan to take it easy since she is near her due date. Dr Brennan & Booth go to the prison to find the killer. Afterwards, Brennan gives birth.

Episodes.title: The Bump In The Road - S07E08
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan is adjusting to her first day back at work after giving birth, and Cam disapproves of her daughter's romance with intern Finn Abernathy.

Episodes.title: The Don't In The Do - S07E09
Episodes.synopsis: When a corpse is found at a landfill, dyed in a blue substance, intern Arastoo Vaziri discovers a method that helps eliminate postmortem damages to the corpse, which leads the team back to a hair salon where the victim worked.

Episodes.title: The Warrior In The Wuss - S07E10
Episodes.synopsis: The corpse of a truck company employee is found in the middle of the woods. After the victim's son is questioned, Booth and Brennan visit his karate class in search of a motive. Back at the lab, Hodgins is going overboard purchasing lab equipment. Then, Booth's son Parker returns from England and Brennan is apprehensive about how he'll react to his new baby sister.

Episodes.title: The Family In The Feud - S07E11
Episodes.synopsis: When a corpse is discovered in the woods, the team considers two families involved in a nearly century-long feud; Brennan is apprehensive when her father offers to baby-sit for her daughter.

Episodes.title: The Suit On Set - S07E12
Episodes.synopsis: While in Los Angeles to consult on a film based on her latest book, Brennan discovers the prop cadaver being used is a murder victim; Booth gets a job offer; embarrassing information about Cam's past comes out.

Episodes.title: The Past In The Present - S07E13
Episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan attend the hearing of Pelant and attempt to put him away once and for all, but the case takes a turn when Brennan becomes a suspect.

Episodes.title: The Future In The Past - S08E01
Episodes.synopsis: Months later, Brennan is still on the run from the FBI, after being framed for murder by Christopher Pelant. The remaining team searches for the real killer.

Episodes.title: The Partners In The Divorce - S08E02
Episodes.synopsis: A burned body is found. The victim is a divorce lawyer who had a lot of disgruntled clients. With Brennan back home, she and Booth have to adjust to living together. They have various disagreements about the new routines at home.

Episodes.title: The Gunk In The Garage - S08E03
Episodes.synopsis: A man dies in a car explosion. After identifying the man, Booth and Brennan find he is still alive. Turns out, the two guys are twins who did not know of the other. Both men are browbeaten by their wives, one of which wanted her husband dead.

Episodes.title: The Tiger In The Tale - S08E04
Episodes.synopsis: An employee is killed in an animal park, and the team determines it is linked to illegal animal trafficking. Dr Sweets and Daisy discuss the current status of their relationship and make a decision.

Episodes.title: The Method In The Madness - S08E05
Episodes.synopsis: The team identify a woman's eviscerated body as a co-owner of a natural applesauce store. There is a symmetry to her incisions. Sweets has been living in his office since the breakup with Daisy so Booth invites him to stay with him and Bones.

Episodes.title: The Patriot In Purgatory - S08E06
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and the team investigate remains of a man linked to the 9/11 terrorist attacks and attempt to determine if he was a victim or a perpetrator.

Episodes.title: The Bod In The Pod - S08E07
Episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a crime scene cleanup expert whose remains are found mysteriously sealed in an impenetrable pod that washed up on the beach. Meanwhile, Angela and Hodgins learn that Cam is involved in a secret romance.

Episodes.title: The But In The Joke - S08E08
Episodes.synopsis: An artist gluing his artwork on a billboard slips and falls with his glue on top of a corpse. The team has to separate the artist from the bones. Angela realizes the artist is a famous street painter. Bones takes up comedy to find suspects.

Episodes.title: The Ghost In The Machine - S08E09
Episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a young boy whose soul remains very much alive. Psychic Avalon Harmonia attempts to help the deceased's spirit cross over.

Episodes.title: The Diamond In The Rough - S08E10
Episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth enter a dance competition to find a killer of a contestant. After the killer is caught, Brennan still wants to enter the competition for the judges.

Episodes.title: The Archaeologist In The Cocoon - S08E11
Episodes.synopsis: An archaeologist is found murdered. His lab holds ancient remains of Neanderthals and Homosapiens; these are given to Clark to research. Brennan is jealous that she has to work the current case and not the ancient one.

Episodes.title: The Corpse On The Canopy - S08E12
Episodes.synopsis: After Hodgins and Angela are drugged and wake up to a bloody corpse hanging in the canopy of their bed and flower petals around their son Michael's crib, they are forced to believe that Pelant is back for revenge against Hodgins.
